shnitsel.data.proxy_class¶

Classes¶

Proxy

Class to wrap an object of a different kind, forward all provided functionality but also be able to insert additional behavior when certain functions are called.

Module Contents¶

class Proxy(obj)¶

Bases: object

Class to wrap an object of a different kind, forward all provided functionality but also be able to insert additional behavior when certain functions are called.
